channel.title: Error connecting to server....tricky problem
channel.description:
Hi, I'm having a problem with my PI based client. I can login on the server with no problems but when someone else tries to login it won't let them, now I will tell you what I did to try and make it work and if I missed something please help me:)
I made a no-ip domain. I jarred the client (even tho it probably doesn't make any difference). I port-forwarded.
and in the client.java I changed:
if(myPrivilege == 2 || server.equals("******.no-ip.info") || 1 == 1/*to remove*/) Server = "********.no-ip.info"; public static String server = "*******.no-ip.info";
Is there anything else I need to change in the client or anywhere else?
Thanks for your time!

item.title: Error connecting to server....tricky problem
item.dc:creator: @Blawan Blawan
item.description:
@Blawan wrote:

[quote=“pkcrown, post:3, topic:546016”]Im sorry to tell that most no-ip addresses has been disabled by microsoft .

https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,663384.0.html[/quote]

That’s resolved, my no-ip works just fine now.

Read full topic

item.title: Error connecting to server....tricky problem
item.dc:creator: @xEthanx xEthanx
item.description:
@xEthanx wrote:

I’m pretty sure no-ip doesn’t require a .info on the end of their IPs, but I could be wrong on that.

Also, saying you port-forwarded and you made a no-ip is silly. Doesn’t no-ip do all that dirty work for you?

Read full topic

item.title: Error connecting to server....tricky problem
item.dc:creator: @Blawan Blawan
item.description:
@Blawan wrote:

Hi, I’m having a problem with my PI based client.
I can login on the server with no problems but when someone else tries to login it won’t let them, now I will tell you what I did to try and make it work and if I missed something please help me:)

I made a no-ip domain.
I jarred the client (even tho it probably doesn’t make any difference).
I port-forwarded.

and in the client.java I changed:

if(myPrivilege == 2 || server.equals(“.no-ip.info") || 1 == 1/to remove/)
Server = "**.no-ip.info”;
public static String server = “*******.no-ip.info”;

Is there anything else I need to change in the client or anywhere else?

Thanks for your time!

Read full topic
